statements: SELECT * FROM livestock_health_monitoring;
SELECT animal_id, heart_rate FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE activity_level > 5;
SELECT id, animal_id, heart_rate, activity_level FROM livestock_health_monitoring ORDER BY activity_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE heart_rate < 60 OR activity_level > 8;
SELECT animal_id, heart_rate FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE animal_id = 3 AND heart_rate >= 70;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE id = 1;
SELECT animal_id, heart_rate FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE activity_level > 50;
SELECT id, activity_level FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE heart_rate < 80 ORDER BY activity_level DESC;
SELECT id, animal_id, heart_rate, activity_level FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE activity_level BETWEEN 50 AND 70;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_monitoring WHERE activity_level > 40 OR heart_rate < 60 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealth;
SELECT id, animal_id, heart_rate, activity_level FROM LivestockHealth WHERE id = 1;
SELECT animal_id, heart_rate, activity_level FROM LivestockHealth ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM SensorData WHERE animal_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT animal_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM SensorData GROUP BY animal_id;
SELECT * FROM LivestockHealth WHERE animal_id = 101 ORDER BY heart_rate ASC, activity_level DESC;
SELECT animal_id, COUNT(*) AS sensor_count FROM SensorData GROUP BY animal_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(heart_rate) AS max_heart_rate, MIN(activity_level) AS min_activity_level FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT animal_id, AVG(heart_rate) AS avg_heart_rate FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY animal_id;
SELECT animal_id, heart_rate, activity_level FROM LivestockHealth WHERE heart_rate > 90 OR activity_level < 0.5 ORDER BY animal_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health WHERE animal_id = 1;
SELECT name, species FROM animal WHERE age > 5;
SELECT sensor_type, battery_level FROM sensor WHERE accuracy >= 0.9;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, sex FROM animal WHERE species = 'Cow';
SELECT * FROM livestock_health WHERE activity_level > 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, species, age FROM animal WHERE sex = 'male';
SELECT id, sensor_type, location, accuracy FROM sensor WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT animal.name, livestock_health.heart_rate FROM animal INNER JOIN livestock_health ON animal.id = livestock_health.animal_id WHERE animal.species = 'Cow';
SELECT * FROM livestock_health WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-01-30 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_data;
SELECT livestock_id, livestock_type FROM livestock_details WHERE livestock_age > 2;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, heart_rate FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vet_id, vet_name FROM veterinarians WHERE vet_specialty = 'Surgery';
SELECT heart_rate, activity_level FROM livestock_health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_data WHERE heart_rate > 80;
SELECT livestock_id, livestock_age FROM livestock_details WHERE livestock_type = 'cow';
SELECT sensor_id, heart_rate, timestamp FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vet_name, vet_specialty FROM veterinarians WHERE vet_specialty = 'Dentistry';
SELECT * FROM livestock_health_data JOIN sensor_data ON livestock_health_data.heart_rate = sensor_data.heart_rate;
SELECT * FROM livestock_health;
SELECT id, livestock_id, heart_rate FROM livestock_health WHERE activity_level > 5;
SELECT species, name FROM livestock WHERE age < 3 ORDER BY species ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM livestock_health ORDER BY heart_rate DESC;
SELECT id, species FROM livestock WHERE age > 5;
SELECT AVG(value) AS avg_value, MIN(value) AS min_value, MAX(value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT livestock.id, livestock.name, sensors.location FROM livestock INNER JOIN sensors ON livestock.id = sensors.sensor_id WHERE sensors.sensor_type = 'temperature';

SELECT livestock.id, livestock.name, sensor_data.timestamp FROM livestock INNER JOIN sensor_data ON livestock.id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_data.value > 100 ORDER BY sensor_data.timestamp DESC;
